search.query: | inputlookup cs_device_inventory | join lansweeper_id type=left [| inputlookup cs_lansweeper_inventory | rename time as lansweeper_last_event | fields - ip, hostname, mac_address, tenable_uuid, qualys_id, sophos_uuid, crowdstrike_userid, windows_defender_host] | join tenable_uuid type=left [| inputlookup cs_tenable_vuln | stats max(_time) as _time, count, count(eval(vul_state="open" OR vul_state="reopened")) as active, count(eval(vul_state="fixed")) as fixed by tenable_uuid, vul_severity | stats max(_time) as _time, sum(count) as total_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="informational", count, 0))) as info_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="low", count, 0))) as low_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="medium", count, 0))) as medium_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="high", count, 0))) as high_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="critical", count, 0))) as critical_vuln, sum(active) as active_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="informational", active, 0))) as info_active_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="low", active, 0))) as low_active_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="medium", active, 0))) as medium_active_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="high", active, 0))) as high_active_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="critical", active, 0))) as critical_active_vuln, sum(fixed) as fixed_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="informational", fixed, 0))) as info_fixed_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="low", fixed, 0))) as low_fixed_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="medium", fixed, 0))) as medium_fixed_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="high", fixed, 0))) as high_fixed_vuln, sum(eval(if(vul_severity="critical", fixed, 0))) as critical_fixed_vuln by tenable_uuid | append [| inputlookup cs_tenable_inventory] | stats values(*) as *, max(time) as time by tenable_uuid | rename time as tenable_last_event, created_at as tenable_created_at, first_seen as tenable_first_seen, last_seen as tenable_last_seen | fields - ip, hostname, mac_address, qualys_id, lansweeper_id, sophos_uuid, crowdstrike_userid, windows_defender_host] | join qualys_id type=left [| inputlookup cs_qualys_inventory.csv | rename time as qualys_last_event | fields - ip, hostname, mac_address, tenable_uuid, lansweeper_id, sophos_uuid, crowdstrike_userid, windows_defender_host] | join sophos_uuid type=left [| inputlookup cs_sophos_inventory | rename time as sophos_last_event | fields - ip, hostname, mac_address, tenable_uuid, qualys_id, lansweeper_id, crowdstrike_userid, windows_defender_host] | join windows_defender_host type=left [| inputlookup cs_windows_defender_inventory | rename time as defender_last_event | fields - ip, hostname, mac_address, tenable_uuid, qualys_id, lansweeper_id, sophos_uuid, crowdstrike_userid] | join crowdstrike_userid type=left [| inputlookup cs_crowdstrike_inventory | rename time as crowdstrike_last_event | fields - ip, hostname, mac_address, tenable_uuid, qualys_id, lansweeper_id, sophos_uuid, windows_defender_host] | rename time as _time | eval lansweeper_os=coalesce(lansweeper_os, AssetType." ".OSVersion." ".AssetVersion) | eval os=coalesce(tenable_os, QUALYS_OS, lansweeper_os) | eval user=mvdedup(mvappend(lansweeper_user, sophos_user, crowdstrike_userid)) | eval lansweeper_status=case(isnull(lansweeper_last_event), "-", 1==1, lansweeper_state) | eval tmp_lansweeper_status = lansweeper_status, lansweeper=case(tmp_lansweeper_status=="Non-active",1,tmp_lansweeper_status=="Active",0) | fieldformat lansweeper=tmp_lansweeper_status | eval qualys_status=case(isnull(qualys_last_event), "-", ACTIVE_SEVERITY_5>0, "Red", ACTIVE_SEVERITY_4>0, "Orange", ACTIVE_SEVERITY_3>0, "Yellow", 1==1, "Green") | eval tmp_qualys_status = qualys_status, qualys=case(tmp_qualys_status == "Red", 3,tmp_qualys_status=="Orange",2, tmp_qualys_status=="Yellow",1, tmp_qualys_status=="Green",0) | fieldformat qualys=tmp_qualys_status | eval tenable_status=case(isnull(tenable_last_event), "-", critical_active_vuln>0, "Red", high_active_vuln>0, "Orange", medium_active_vuln>0, "Yellow", 1==1, "Green") | eval tmp_tenable_status = tenable_status, tenable=case(tmp_tenable_status == "Red", 3,tmp_tenable_status=="Orange",2, tmp_tenable_status=="Yellow",1, tmp_tenable_status=="Green",0) | fieldformat tenable=tmp_tenable_status | eval defender_status=case(isnull(defender_last_event), "-", 1==1, RTP_state) | eval tmp_defender_status = defender_status, defender=case(tmp_defender_status == "Enabled", 0,tmp_defender_status=="Disabled",1,true(),tmp_defender_status) | fieldformat defender=tmp_defender_status | eval sophos_status=case(isnull(sophos_last_event), "-", isnull(sophos_status), "RTP Enabled", 1==1, sophos_status) | eval tmp_sophos_status = sophos_status, sophos=case(tmp_sophos_status == "RTP Enabled", 0,tmp_sophos_status=="RTP Disabled",1,tmp_sophos_status=="Service not Running",2) | fieldformat sophos=tmp_sophos_status | eval crowdstrike_status=if(isnull(crowdstrike_last_event), "-", "Present") | eval tmp_crowdstrike_status = crowdstrike_status, crowdstrike=case(tmp_crowdstrike_status == "Present", 0) | fieldformat crowdstrike=tmp_crowdstrike_status | eval ip_drilldown=ip, hostname_drilldown=hostname, user_drilldown=mvjoin(user, ",") | makemv ip delim="," | makemv hostname delim="," | makemv mac_address delim="," | eval active_vul=coalesce(active_vuln, ACTIVE), total_vul=coalesce(total_vuln, TOTAL_VULNS) | table _time, uuid, ip, hostname, mac_address, user, os, lansweeper, qualys, tenable, active_vul, total_vul, sophos, defender, crowdstrike, tmp_*, *_last_event, ip_drilldown, hostname_drilldown, user_drilldown | fields - crowdstrike_status, sophos_status, defender_status, tenable_status, qualys_status, lansweeper_status

| stats sum(lansweeper_last_event) as field_lansweeper, sum(qualys_last_event) as field_qualys, sum(tenable_last_event) as field_tenable, sum(sophos_last_event) as field_sophos, sum(defender_last_event) as field_defender, sum(crowdstrike_last_event) as field_crowdstrike | eval field_lansweeper=if(field_lansweeper>0, ", lansweeper", ""), field_qualys=if(field_qualys>0, ", qualys", ""), field_tenable=if(field_tenable>0, ", tenable", ""), field_sophos=if(field_sophos>0, ", sophos", ""), field_defender=if(field_defender>0, ", defender", ""), field_crowdstrike=if(field_crowdstrike>0, ", crowdstrike", "")

| inputlookup cs_device_inventory | stats count as Total, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="", 1, 0))) as Lansweeper, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="", 1, 0))) as Qualys, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="", 1, 0))) as Tenable, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="", 1, 0))) as Defender, sum(eval(if((isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!=""), 1, 0))) as Sophos, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="", 1, 0))) as CrowdStrike, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="" AND isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="", 1, 0))) as lansweeper_qualys, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="" AND isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="", 1, 0))) as lansweeper_tenable, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="" AND isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="", 1, 0))) as lansweeper_defender, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="" AND isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="", 1, 0))) as lansweeper_sophos, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="" AND isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="", 1, 0))) as lansweeper_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="" AND isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="", 1, 0))) as qualys_tenable, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="" AND isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="", 1, 0))) as qualys_sophos, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="" AND isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="", 1, 0))) as qualys_defender, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="" AND isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="", 1, 0))) as qualys_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="" AND isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="", 1, 0))) as tenable_sophos, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="" AND isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="", 1, 0))) as tenable_defender, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="" AND isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="", 1, 0))) as tenable_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="" AND isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="", 1, 0))) as sophos_defender, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="" AND isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="", 1, 0))) as sophos_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="" AND isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="", 1, 0))) as defender_crowdstrike, sum(eval(if(((isnotnull(lansweeper_id) and lansweeper_id!="") AND ((isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="") OR (isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="")) AND ((isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="") OR (isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="") OR (isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!=""))), 1, 0))) as All, sum(eval(if(((isnotnull(qualys_id) and qualys_id!="") OR (isnotnull(tenable_uuid) and tenable_uuid!="")), 1, 0))) as Vulnerability_Scanner, sum(eval(if(((isnotnull(windows_defender_host) and windows_defender_host!="") OR (isnotnull(sophos_uuid) and sophos_uuid!="") OR (isnotnull(crowdstrike_userid) and crowdstrike_userid!="")), 1, 0))) as Antivirus | eval No_Lansweeper=Total-Lansweeper, No_Qualys=Total-Qualys, No_Tenable=Total-Tenable, No_Sophos=Total-Sophos, No_Defender=Total-Defender, No_CrowdStrike=Total-CrowdStrike, No_Antivirus=Total-Antivirus, No_Vulnerability_Scanner=Total-Vulnerability_Scanner

html.p: Device Inventory generator report needs to be enabled.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" title IN ("Device Inventory - Lansweeper", "Device Inventory - Tenable", "Device Inventory - Tenable Vuln", "Device Inventory - Qualys", "Device Inventory - Sophos", "Device Inventory - Windows Defender", "Device Inventory - CrowdStrike", "Device Inventory Gen", "Device Inventory Temp Lookup CleanUp", "Device Inventory Lookup CleanUp") | table title, disabled | rename title as label | eval status=if(disabled=1, "Report is disabled", "Report is enabled") | table label, status

format.colorPalette: {"Data Present": #03991a, "Data Not Present": #a3030b, "Report is enabled": #03991a, "Report is disabled": #a3030b}

html.p: If you are looking at the Device Inventory for the first time and you don't see all the available devices in the table below then you can manually execute Device Inventory Backfill report to fill all the lookups. (By default it runs over last 30 days of time to collect the device inventory.)
Description: The total amount of devices detected.
Note - Click on any of the surrounding bar charts to view more information about specific devices in the Device Inventory. Click on the number above to reset the filter.

chart.title: Number of Devices That Are Connected To A Specific Security Component

search.query: | table Total, Lansweeper, Qualys, Tenable, Sophos, Defender, CrowdStrike

html.p: Description: The total amount of devices that are connected to a particular security component.

chart.title: Number of Devices That Contain A Specific Security Component

search.query: | table Total, All, Lansweeper, Vulnerability_Scanner, Antivirus

condition.set: ((lansweeper_last_event=*) AND (tenable_last_event=* OR qualys_last_event=*) AND (sophos_last_event=* OR defender_last_event=* OR crowdstrike_last_event=*))

html.p: Description: Each bar represents the total number of devices that are connected to a particular security component. The Lansweeper bar displays the number of devices that have Lansweeper. The Vulnerability Scanner bar displays the number of devices that have either Qualys or Tenable. The Antivirus bar displays the number of devices that have CrowdStrike, Defender, or Sophos.

chart.title: Number of Devices That Lack A Specific Security Component

html.p: Description: Each bar represents the total number of devices that lack a particular security component. The Lansweeper bar displays the number of devices where Lansweeper is absent. The Vulnerability Scanner displays the number of devices where Qualys or Tenable are absent. The Antivirus bar displays the number of devices that lack the following antivirus software: CrowdStrike, Defender, and Sophos.

search.query: search $tkn_sp_filter$ | table uuid, hostname, ip, mac_address, os, user $tkn_tablefields_lansweeper$ $tkn_tablefields_qualys$ $tkn_tablefields_tenable$, active_vul, total_vul $tkn_tablefields_sophos$ $tkn_tablefields_defender$ $tkn_tablefields_crowdstrike$ lansweeper_user sophos_user crowdstrike_user tmp_* ip_drilldown hostname_drilldown user_drilldown | search $tkn_host$ $tkn_ip$ $tkn_user$ $tkn_mac$

table.fields: uuid, hostname, ip, mac_address, os, user $tkn_tablefields_lansweeper$ $tkn_tablefields_qualys$ $tkn_tablefields_tenable$, active_vul, total_vul $tkn_tablefields_sophos$ $tkn_tablefields_defender$ $tkn_tablefields_crowdstrike$

html.p: If a hyphen(-) appears in the table that means data isn't present for that specific category.
The Device Inventory will automatically hide columns for devices that lack a certain type of data.
